title: Self-Directed Case-Based Online Education Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and understanding of elementary social studies curriculum
context.additional_context: A program for corporate elementary education practitioners, strengthening self-directed learning abilities through real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world elementary social studies education cases to derive problem-solving solutions.
Learners can self-directively establish and execute learning plans on online platforms.
Through case-based discussions and feedback, learners can collaboratively solve problems with peer learners.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
